raw_text: Placement drive for TechCorp Solutions scheduled for March 15th. All eligible B.Tech CSE students must register by March 10th.
formatted_message: Placement Alert - TechCorp Solutions placement drive on March 15th. Registration deadline: March 10th for B.Tech CSE students.

raw_text: Congratulations to all students who cleared the first round of Axeno Software Intern interviews. Second round scheduled for tomorrow.
formatted_message: Shortlisting Update - Axeno Software Intern - First round cleared! Second round interviews tomorrow.

raw_text: Important: All students appearing for Analytics Pro Data Analyst position must bring original mark sheets and updated resume.
formatted_message: Important Notice - Analytics Pro Data Analyst interviews - Bring original mark sheets & updated resume.

raw_text: Pre-placement talk by Microsoft scheduled for March 20th at 2 PM in Auditorium A. All final year students invited.
formatted_message: Pre-Placement Talk - Microsoft - March 20th, 2 PM at Auditorium A. All final year students invited.

raw_text: Final shortlist for TechCorp Solutions Full Stack Developer position announced. Selected candidates for final interview round.
formatted_message: Final Shortlisting - TechCorp Solutions Full Stack Developer - Final interview candidates selected.
